org.elasticsearch.common.geo

Class GeoDistance.FixedSourceDistanceBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.geo.GeoDistance.FixedSourceDistanceBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeoDistance.FixedSourceDistance
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoDistance.ArcFixedSourceDistance, GeoDistance.SloppyArcFixedSourceDistance
    Enclosing class:
    GeoDistance

    public abstract static class GeoDistance.FixedSourceDistanceBase
extends Object
implements GeoDistance.FixedSourceDistance
    Basic implementation of GeoDistance.FixedSourceDistance. This class keeps the basic parameters for a distance functions based on a fixed source. Namely latitude, longitude and unit.
